sneckomod:TailWhip.NAME: Tail Whip
sneckomod:TailWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

sneckomod:SoulRoll.NAME: Soul Roll
sneckomod:SoulRoll.DESCRIPTION: Randomize the cost of cards in your hand.
sneckomod:SoulRoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Randomize the cost of cards in your hand. NL Draw 1 card.

sneckomod:PerplexingStare.NAME: Perplexing Stare
sneckomod:PerplexingStare.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies gain between -3 and !M! Strength.

sneckomod:SnekBeam.NAME: Snek Beam
sneckomod:SnekBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the number of Unknown cards in your deck.

sneckomod:Nope.NAME: Nope
sneckomod:Nope.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Replace it with a random card of the same type with a randomized cost.
